traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

traits.locale_text: {n}Before you even finish speaking, the xenos is gone from view and you feel something cold and sharp pressed against the nape of your neck. The familiar lugubrious baritone sounds directly above your ear:{/n} "You make yourself a fool by baiting me, the one who knows ahead the players' moves. Locate your wits, I say, and listen well." {n}You blink, and the xenos is once again standing before you.{/n}
